body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.25 is now available.

ul.li: Support for various Unicode file encodings in Notepad.
Improved memory management, especially for OpenGL.
Desktop menus now cleaned up automatically.
Beginnings of a windowscodecs DLL implementation.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
